markdownRemark.html:
I’ve not really played around with WebSockets much, so I’ve made it my goal to build something that relies on WebSockets. I’m also a huge Go fan and fancied sinking my teeth into the popular gorilla/websocket package.

The side project I’m working on is basically a dead simple group chat application. Users can create a group and invite their friends to join.

We’ll start

frontmatter.title: How I like to Structure and Build Go Services
